_sText:
*!*!*!*!* New to mg_fred *!*!*!*!*

Mg_fred_v4 is an obstacle map just like mg_bob
It took over a week to make and about 4 hours to compile
It has 35 levels, lost of fun, a swimming tool to finish and an AK47 spawner and a deagle spawner and also  a secret admin room with many weapon spawners and a few weapons with colourfull trails!!! :O

*!*!*!*!* Whats New?? *!*!*!*!*
There are many differences between mg_fred_v3 and mg_fred_v4.

Firstly i have added 5 more levels onto the end of the map

Secondly i have added weapons with trails at the end so you can run round with petty colours following you :O :D

Thirdly i have added alot of lighting making the map look alot more ambient and enjoyable to look at

Lastly i have added waterfalls with sounds throughout the level because they make the level look pretty and also it adds a sense of realism to the map.

*!*!*!*!* Server Commands *!*!*!*!*
sv_airaccelerate 800

*!*!*!*!* Feedback *!*!*!*!*
Please rate/comment on my map

Commenting: please give pros, cons and improvements for me to make a better map next time i come round to making one. 

*!* EDIT *!*
I have uploaded the correct map and put the textures in so the black and pink textures should have gone :). enjoy :3

EDIT!
okay, pakrat is really annoying me, so.. heres a link to the textures i used for my waterfalls
http://www.tophattwaffle.com/?page_id=675
put them in your cstrike/materials folder
if any1 would like to pakrat it for me and send me the new bsp file it would be much appreciated :) and of course i'll give you credit :)

K Tnx Bye.
